net.proteusframework.core.hibernate

Class BatchLoaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.BatchLoaderHelper

  • public class BatchLoaderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for batch loading entities by ID. This class is not thread-safe.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
